Articles.Content: How would I set up my Wingman Rumblepad 1 (Game controller/ joystick) to work with KSP!?!?!?!?! Ive been trying for the last 2 hours! Please Help!
i know iv tryed seting up my joystick but it dosent work with ksp,it works with flight simulater X thogh ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
